reviewText: These are fairly well regarded movies, all are 6.2 or higher at IMDb. You couldn't tell by me. These movies had very poor picture quality, dialogue that was very hard to understand (at least for me), and no subtitles to help out. Would not have bought if I had a 'test drive' like at a car dealer.
Bought as a gift  ,, got the movie I wanted and a bonus of three more
